DevOps Engineer (Green Energy)

We are seeking a DevOps Engineer with strong technical capabilities in cloud and container tooling alongside programming abilities to help create a global platform and tech backbone for a green energy provider.

As a DevOps Engineer you will join a superb Platform Engineering and DevOps team responsible for the build, scalability and reliability of core infrastructure running in a GCP, containerised (Docker deployed to Kubernetes), Terraform and Python environment.

Within the role you will join a superb Platform Engineering and DevOps team responsible for the build, scalability and reliability of core infrastructure running in a GCP, containerised (Docker deployed to Kubernetes), Terraform and Python environment.

You will have major influence over the success of the platform as it expands globally and a great opportunity to deliver green energy technologies both in the UK, and internationally, in markets that are expanding rapidly. As proof, this was the fastest growing company in the UK throughout 2019.

We are seeking a DevOps Engineer with;

  • Strong technical capabilities and an ability to work within GCP or AWS cloud
  • Experience with production container tools including Kubernetes and Docker
  • Experience in an infrastructure as code environment using tools likes Terraform or Cloudformation
  • Python or development experience is very important (Python a strong preference in language)

DevOps Engineer (Green Energy)

Salary: £80,000 - £95,000 plus Benefits

Location: Central London
